requiredEquipmentExplanation: The workout video titled "GET STRONG" Best Core Exercises For Kids (15 Minute Kids Workout) indicates that it is focused on core exercises for kids. The absence of any specific equipment mentions in the title, description, and tags strongly suggests that this workout relies on bodyweight exercises only. Such kids-focused workouts typically involve simple movements like sit-ups, planks, and leg raises, which are usually performed without additional equipment. Additionally, the target audience, being kids, further implies that no complex or heavy equipment would be necessary or appropriate. The overall approach of the channel, as described in the channel details, emphasizes fun and fitness without complexity, reinforcing the decision to classify this as a bodyweight-only workout.
